about_the_game:
— Unraveling this planet, the quiz is a quest.



Laby and the Mysterious Planet can be played anytime and with anyone! A quiz game where up to 8 players can play together to win.
On a mysterious planet where "piece of quiz" are floating, you and your robot buddy "Laby" will try to restore the liveliness of the planet through quizzes!

Play with anyone, anytime.

The game is multi-platform (iOS/Android/Steam/Browser). You can play with anyone at any time on your favorite device.

Battle with quizzes!

The quiz in this game is a win-lose quiz game that can be played by 2 to 8 players.
The quiz genres, such as history, literature, and entertainment, as well as the format of the questions, change as you play the game.
Win the rounds and aim to be the last one standing!

Let's make an original quiz!

Create your own original quiz and battle it out with your friends!
You can not only be a question-taker, but you can also share your quizzes with other users and have them play with you.
Of course, you can also ask questions from quizzes created by others.



Mysterious Planet

The game takes place on a mysterious planet where an ore called "piece of quiz" floats on the surface.
On this planet, where vast nature spreads out, a rabbit-like plump robot "Laby" lives.

Solve the orphaned quizzes and restore the planet's liveliness.

Laby and his team seem to be searching for piece of quiz that exist on the planet on a daily basis.

The piece of quiz contains a vast amount of information, and by solving the quiz and analyzing it, the landscape that once existed on this planet will be reconstructed.

Laby's friends

As the reconstruction of the planet progresses, the number of Laby's friends will also increase.
Various facilities such as a lab where Laby's appearance can be customized and a theater where Laby and his friends' memories are shown are likely to increase.

Enjoy quizzes with Laby and uncover the secrets of this planet!

movies.name: 「みんなでクイズ ラビィとふしぎな惑星」トレイラー

name: みんなでクイズ ラビィとふしぎな惑星

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x32bit
  • Processor: INTEL i3-4330
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: INTEL HD Graphics 4600
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: INTEL i3-4330
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650
